casebody.data:
Leavitt
v.
Hargrove 268P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Owen D. Leavitt, for Leavitt, Owen Deshawn. Paul J. Stainback, Attorney at Law, Henderson, for Hargrove, Willie.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of July 2016 by Plaintiff to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."
